title: Baby Carrier
description: upper rectangular panel with black border; applique in red and black lines and squares; lower square panel with wide black border; maze-like center batik with red, yellow applique surrounded by appliqued lines and squares in red, black, yellow, green, white; small red rectanglue near top of panel; nine pink and green yarn tufts within applique pattern at top, bottom, center; top--white lining; bottom--blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
